languages.text: "Чумные они или нет, сбежали от еретиков или сами еретики — как мы узнаем? Лучше прирезать. Просто на всякий случай!"
"Plagued or not, victims of heretics or actual heretics — how are we to know? Let's just cut their throats. Better safe than sorry!"
languages.original_text: "Чумные они или нет, сбежали от еретиков или сами еретики — как мы узнаем? Лучше прирезать. Просто на всякий случай!"

traits.locale_text: "Plagued or not plagued, victims of heretics or actual heretics — how are we to know? Let's just cut their throats. Better safe than sorry!"
"Plagued or not plagued, victims of heretics or actual heretics — how are we to know? Let's just cut their throats. Better safe than sorry!"
"Plagued or not, victims of heretics or actual heretics — how are we to know? Let's just cut their throats. Better safe than sorry!"
"Plagued or not, victims of heretics or actual heretics — how are we to know? Let's just cut their throats. Better safe than sorry!"
"Plagued or not, victims of heretics or actual heretics — how are we to know? Let's just cut their throats. Better safe than sorry!"

languages.text: 「穢れているかいないか、異端者の被害者か異端者自身かは俺たちにはわかりっこない。とりあえず首を掻っ切れ。後で後悔するより念のために殺しておいたほうがいいだろう！」
languages.original_text: "Plagued or not, victims of heretics or actual heretics — how are we to know? Let's just cut their throats. Better safe than sorry!"

traits.locale_text: 「穢れているかいないか、異端者の被害者か異端者自身かは俺たちにはわかりっこない。とりあえず首を掻っ切れ。後で後悔するより念のために殺しておいたほうがいいだろう！」

languages.text: “谁知道他们带不带病？谁知道他们是异端分子的受害者还是真正的异端分子？不如直接割了他们的喉咙吧！有备无患！”
languages.original_text: "Plagued or not, victims of heretics or actual heretics — how are we to know? Let's just cut their throats. Better safe than sorry!"

traits.locale_text: “谁知道他们带不带病？谁知道他们是异端分子的受害者还是真正的异端分子？不如直接割了他们的喉咙吧！有备无患！”

languages.text: «¿Y ahora cómo sabemos nosotros quién es víctima o hereje? ¿O si están infectados o no? Los degollamos a todos y listo. ¡Mejor prevenir que curar!».
languages.original_text: "Plagued or not, victims of heretics or actual heretics — how are we to know? Let's just cut their throats. Better safe than sorry!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y ahora cómo sabemos nosotros quién es víctima o hereje? ¿O si están infectados o no? Los degollamos a todos y listo. ¡Mejor prevenir que curar!».

languages.text: « Pestiférés ou non, hérétiques ou victimes d'hérétiques... Comment est-ce qu'on pourrait savoir ? Tranchons-leur la gorge. Au moins, on sera tranquilles. »
languages.original_text: "Plagued or not, victims of heretics or actual heretics — how are we to know? Let's just cut their throats. Better safe than sorry!"

traits.locale_text: « Pestiférés ou non, hérétiques ou victimes d'hérétiques... Comment est-ce qu'on pourrait savoir ? Tranchons-leur la gorge. Au moins, on sera tranquilles. »

languages.text: "Seuche oder nicht, Opfer von Ketzern oder selbst Ketzer – woher sollen wir das wissen? Schneiden wir ihnen einfach die Kehle durch. Vorsicht ist besser als Nachsicht!"
languages.original_text: "Plagued or not, victims of heretics or actual heretics — how are we to know? Let's just cut their throats. Better safe than sorry!"

traits.locale_text: "Seuche oder nicht, Opfer von Ketzern oder selbst Ketzer – woher sollen wir das wissen? Schneiden wir ihnen einfach die Kehle durch. Vorsicht ist besser als Nachsicht!"

languages.text: "Vebalı mı değil mi, kâfirlik kurbanı mı sahici kâfirler mi nereden bileceğiz? Boğazlarını keselim gitsin. Ne olur ne olmaz!"
languages.original_text: "Plagued or not, victims of heretics or actual heretics — how are we to know? Let's just cut their throats. Better safe than sorry!"

traits.locale_text: "Salgın mı değil mi, kâfirlik kurbanları mı yoksa gerçek kâfirler mi, bunları nereden bileceğiz? Bence boğazlarını kesiverelim. Temkinli olmakta fayda var!"
